snippet: Admission to Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s speech to Congress on Tuesday was “hotter than fresh latkes,” Senator Charles E. Schumer of New York said.
abstract: Demand is high for tickets to see Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu address Congress as each member can invite only one person to sit in gallery.
lead_paragraph: Admission to Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s speech to Congress on Tuesday was “hotter than fresh latkes,” Senator Charles E. Schumer of New York said.

headline.main: The Cry Being Heard Around Washington: ‘I Need a Netanyahu Ticket’
headline.print_headline: The Cry Being Heard Around Washington: ‘I Need a Netanyahu Ticket’
